author: Nicolas Taraviras
title: BSL expression that most clearly represents the arithmietic expression
question: Is there somewhere it was mentioned how to create the most clear expressions? I have made multiple attempts to no avail so far and can not find mention of how to make the expression more clear.
instructor_answer: Think about it this way. If your job was to read the original equation and the BSL expression one above the other to check that they matched, what way of writing the bsl expression would make that job easiest.
